questions.text: Can you tell me a little bit about you?
Do you have any projects that i can look into?
How can i get in contact with you?
Can you please share your socials?

1: Hi again! I'm Elena Kekic üí´, a 19 y/o Junior Full-Stack Web Developer üë©‚Äçüíª
Althrough my roots come from Romania and Serbia, I was born in Italy, specifically in Trieste üìç
This diverse background is one of the reasons I have a passion for learning languages! Having more than one language in your pocket is always better in my opinion
and being able to communicate with multiple people has always fascinated me
'The more, the merrier,' as they say, and I couldn‚Äôt agree more üòå
Fun fact: I'm passionate about editing, but the idea of bringing things to life through code caught my attention üßê.
I also consider myself to be quite creative, so animating on a website sounded fun!
I decided to give coding a shot... and here we are
I'm still upgrading my skills tho, since learning never truly ends in this field.
2: HTML, CSS, SASS, Javascript, Typescript, Angular, Bootstrap, GSAP, Node.js, RxJS, Responsive design
Java, Spring Boot, SQL, PostgreSQL, JWT

7.quote: 'Don't do things just because you wanna do things. Do what's interesting to you and don't worry about the outcome.'
'If you wanna run faster, you gotta run with a bunch of people who run faster of you.'
'Everyone is jealous of what you've got. No one is jealous of how you got it. People see the throphies but not the training'
'To get something you never had, you have to do something you never did.'
'You can't control the wind, but you can adjust your sails.'

7: If you want to hear more, ask me the same question again üí¨
Or, if you have anything else in mind, ask away!
9: Gotta admit it, they are a very reliable companion
Okay now back to being serious, do you wanna ask more?
10: Okay now back to being serious, do you wanna ask more?
11: Editing has always been a part of my life
Almost in everything i do, my editing skills have always been useful!
It made me also meet new people! So i'm always happy to edit for others or myself ‚ú®
and because of that, I've decided to make an account on insta to storage all my work!
